question: Which city is the venue of the Maritime India Summit (MIS) 2021?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is to virtually inaugurate the second edition of the Maritime India Summit (MIS) on March 2, 2021.
As per the official statement by the Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Waterways, the opening session will have ministerial-level participation from several countries. it is also expected that Rs 20,000 crore worth MoUs will be signed during this Summit.
